text: "Don't Talk" is a song written, produced and performed by American contemporary R&B; singer Jon B, issued as the only official single from his third studio album Pleasures U Like. The song peaked at #58 on the Billboard Hot 100 in 2001. ==Music video== The official music video for the song was directed by Marcus Raboy. ==Chart positions== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2001) !Peak position |- |US Billboard Hot 100 |align=center|58 |- |US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks (Billboard) |align=center|21 |- |US Rhythmic Top 40 (Billboard) |align=center|20 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2001 songs Category:2001 singles Category:Jon B. songs Category:Epic Records singles Category:Music videos directed by Marcus Raboy Category:Song recordings produced by Jon B. Category:Songs written by Jon B.
title: Don't Talk (song)
